column1: Little Goat Diner////My wife had the bahn mi
column2: and it was actually terrible. The worst bahn mi we've ever had
column3: to the point of being inedible. It was like they had poured an entire bottle of fish sauce on it
column4: and that was all you could taste
column6: is very good in its proper dose
column7: but basically tastes like rotten fish.
